short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A foreign language learning aid that allows you to view bilingual subtitles by blocking them with a black block!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watching a bilingual movie provides a way to practice listening by blocking it out. Or just watch subtitles in one language to practice speech.
